name: N0de: Machina Omega
summary:
Congratulations!

You have been selected as Innomus' next Virtual Network Defense Contractor (VNDC)! You have been chosen because you are a talented go-getter, ready to explore the next generation of block-chain computing technologies, n0d3!

Each n0d3 is a fully procedural and enclosed environment derived from the periodic table of elements. Animon builders will generate a full set of procedural items and weapons for you each time you enter a new n0d3. If you require assistance, feel free to summon another Contractor for aid! Though, be warned that this feature gives Contractors the chance to invade you as well!

Full gameplay video can be found here::https://

name: N0-Exit
summary: The game tells the story of a miner who was trapped in an iron mine after a strong earthquake , now he fights contro many monsters to survive and find a way out .
